option.chloride.category.zoom.name: Zoom FOV
option.chloride.category.fog.water.off.t: OFF: Completely turn off fog under water
option.chloride.category.fog.water.potio: POTIONS: Turn off fog under water only when having water breathing effect on
NORMAL: Normal Minecraft fog under water
option.chloride.category.fog.lava.off.to: OFF: Completely turn off fog in the lava
option.chloride.category.fog.lava.potion: POTIONS: Turn off fog in the lava only when having fire resistance effect on
option.chloride.category.fog.lava.full.t: NORMAL: Normal Minecraft fog in the lava
